title: List of all Androidsecurity   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidsecurity   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: AndroidLibrary
repoList.description: Android library to reveal or obfuscate strings and assets at runtime

repoList.name: AESCrypt-Android
repoList.description: Simple API to perform AES encryption on Android. This is the Android counterpart to the AESCrypt library Ruby and Obj-C (with the same weak security defaults :( ) created by Gurpartap Singh.  https://github.com/Gurpartap/aescrypt

repoList.name: tor-android
repoList.description: Tor binary and library for Android

repoList.name: LibScout
repoList.description: LibScout: Third-party library detector for Java/Android apps

repoList.name: PasscodeView
repoList.description: PasscodeView is an Android Library to easily and securely authenticate user with PIN code or using the fingerprint scanner.

repoList.name: capillary
repoList.description: Capillary is a library to simplify the sending of end-to-end encrypted push messages from Java-based application servers to Android clients.

repoList.name: ksprefs
repoList.description: 🚀⚡ Kotlin SharedPreferences wrapper & cryptographic preferences android library.

repoList.name: SafeContentResolver
repoList.description: A replacement for Android's ContentResolver that protects against the Surreptitious Sharing attack

repoList.name: EasyDataAnalyzer
repoList.description: :bar_chart: [Android-Library] Monitor network data information of your apps in android devices. NOTE : won't work from nougat and above due to security reasons.

repoList.name: Android-Tamper-Detector
repoList.description: A simple library that can help you detect if you app is modded or tampered with
